FILE: cm355705v11.0.txt
DYAD: BULGARIA - KAZAKHSTAN
RIVALRY: RIV953
DISPUTE(S): MID4086 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180911
LS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180911

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4086 

TERRMID: MID4086 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4086 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID4086 from Gibler 2018, in 1996, Kazakhstan forced a Bulgarian plane to land and seized weapons on board the plane. Coded not territory because no boundary was being disputed. 

TERRLINK: MID4086 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4086 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4086 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4086 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4086 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4086 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4086 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4086 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4086 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4086 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4086 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4086 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4086 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4086 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID3 1993-2001:

MID4086
rivalry=355705 nationa=KAZAKHSTAN nationb=BULGARIA MID4086 19960123-19960123 
 revtype1a=POLICY revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=USE OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0 lhostb=
NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

This dispute consisted of only one incident, the Kazakh seizure of weapons and ammunition bound for Afghanistan aboard a Bulgarian plane that was forced to land in Kazkhstan. Bulgaria protested the incident. This incident was not coded as part of dispute 55 because more than 6 months elapsed between incidents. First and last day of dispute was on 1/23/1996.

RIVNOTES: 

NARRATIVE-CM:

SOURCES-CM:

NARRATIVE-CR:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
